body:
Dropbox module

Work with Dropbox files and folders
dropbox
Tangler\Module\Dropbox\Module

Trigger: New Dropbox file trigger

This thing monitors a Dropbox directory for new files
new_file
Tangler\Module\Dropbox\NewFileTrigger
  • accesstoken (string): API access token
  • clientid (string): Client identifier
  • path (string): Absolute path in Dropbox to monitor
